text: @Jim_Jordan Dear America, I don't have to tell you that this is a matter of life and death. Listen to the medical experts. Don't listen to Gym or Trump or Fox. If they cared about you would they be pushing protect to employers from coronavirus-related lawsuits if you get sick/die on the job?
